title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, four-sided, stem and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Alphabet and numerals at top.  The symbols of the passion; then domestic animals and flowers.  In center, crowned initials and a date.  Squares of pattern in the lower corners and celebrating people at the bottom.
name: Sampler
